FuncDef: This command configures a source TCP or UDP port number or port range for a management access filter match criterion.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the source TCP or UDP port number as match criteria. Values-1 to 65535 (decimal).
Specifies the mask used to specify a range of source port numbers as the match criterion. Values-1 to 65535 (decimal). ParamDefault: Default- 65535 (exact match)
